text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a HOSP

name: HospitalPracticeSetting
title: HospitalPracticeSetting
description: An acute care institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.
